pages.text:
Membership
Make Eagle RidgeYour Home Course
Active golfers or families of golfers will find their "home course" at Eagle Ridge Golf Course in Fort Myers. Our annual membership gives our golfer a simple one time cart fee each time you play and 14 days advanced tee times for our Platinum and Gold members. Be sure to use our request form below to receive additional information.
Membership Options
2025 Summer Memberships
Summer Membership
(Single $500 & Family $775)
May 1 - October 31
Cart Fee $28.00
6 days advance tee times
50% Off Range Balls
10% discounted guest fees
Reciprocal Privileges
Download Application Form
2025 Annual Memberships
Annual Platinum
(Single $7,300 & Family $9,500)
No playing restrictions
Cart Fee $28.00
14 days advance tee times
Free Range Balls
10% discounted guest fees
Reciprocal Privileges May - October
USGA 2024 Handicap
Download Application Form
Annual Gold
(Single $4,100 & Family $5,950)
Playing restrictions - December 26th - April 30th
7:00am - 9:00am or after 1:00pm - $28.00 Cart Fee
14 days advance tee times
Free Range Balls
10% discounted guest fees
Reciprocal Privileges May - October
USGA 2024 Handicap
Download Application Form
2025 9 Hole Memberships
9 Hole Membership
(Single $1,900 & Family $2,900)
Playing restrictions - November 1st - April 30th
After 2:00pm - $21.00 Cart Fee (9 hole only)
No Playing restrictions - May 1st - October 31st
Any time of day - $28 fee for 18 holes / $21 fee for 9 holes
14 days advance tee times
Free Range Balls
USGA 2024 Handicap
Download Application Form
